      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnetic domains  magnetised iron</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetische Gebiete magnetisiertes Eisen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fer magnétisé par domaines magnétiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Domínios magnéticos ferro magnetizado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ferro magnetizzato settori magnetici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγνητικός μαγνητισμένος δικτυακές γειτονιές σίδηρος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hierro magnetizado dominios magnéticos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of three illustrations showing behaviour of magnetic domains. Orientation for magnetised iron is shown here.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic domain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field lines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">south pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von drei Abbildungen, die 
Verhalten der magnetischen Gebiete zeigen. Lagebestimmung für 
magnetisiertes Eisen wird hier gezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de trois illustrations montrant le 
comportement des domaines magnétiques. L'orientation pour le 
fer magnétisé est montrée ici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de três ilustrações que mostram o 
comportamento de domínios magnéticos. A orientação para o 
ferro magnetizado é mostrada aqui.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di tre illustrazioni che 
mostrano comportamento dei settori magnetici. L'orientamento per
ferro magnetizzato è indicato qui.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν συμπεριφορά
των μαγνητικών δικτυακών γειτονιών. Ο προσανατολισμός για το
μαγνητισμένο σίδηρο εμφανίζεται εδώ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de tres ilustraciones que 
muestran el comportamiento de dominios magnéticos. La 
orientación para el hierro magnetizado se muestra aquí.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Eisen</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
